description: Item catalog for The Understage gamebook adaptation

properties.name: Consumable
properties.description: Used once, then removed from inventory

properties.name: Plot-Critical
properties.description: Cannot be dropped; counts toward limit

properties.name: Hidden
properties.description: Does not count toward carry limit (rare)

properties.name: Cursed
properties.description: Cannot be dropped until specific condition met

vertical_slice.name: Booth Key
vertical_slice.description: A rusty iron key that unlocks the prompter's booth door
vertical_slice.effect: Opens iron door to Threshold Stage

vertical_slice.name: Wings Pass
vertical_slice.description: A temporary pass allowing access to the theatre wings

act1.name: Prompter's Handbook
act1.description: Your guide to the Understage basics

act1.name: Rehearsal Candle
act1.effect: Reveals hidden text in one scene

act1.name: Genre Compass
act1.description: Indicates dominant genre of current location

act1.name: Understudy's Mask
act1.description: Appear as a minor character briefly

act2_faction.name: Sealed Archive Key
act2_faction.description: Granted for completing Missing Script quest. One-time access to the Sealed Archive where first drafts are preserved.

act2_faction.name: Writer's Pen
act2_faction.description: Granted for completing Troubled Actor quest. One-time use to rewrite a minor narrative element.
act2_faction.effect: Single-use rewrite of one choice or scene element

act2_faction.name: Diplomat's Token
act2_faction.description: Granted for completing Balance of Power quest. A blank token that appears as whatever token is needed.
act2_faction.effect: One use per hub: gain temporary access to any faction-gated content or bonus

act2_faction.name: Wayfinder
act2_faction.description: Granted by the Gatekeeper. A compass that points toward what matters most.
act2_faction.effect: Reveals the most important available choice in each scene

act2_faction.name: Reality Anchors
act2_faction.description: Granted during Gate Tour. Small pouch of crystallized reality dust.
act2_faction.effect: Stabilize dimensional crossing or resist reality-warping effects

act2_faction.name: Threshold Fragment
act2_faction.description: Granted for completing Escaped Character quest. A crystalline fragment from the Threshold Gate itself.
act2_faction.effect: One-time passage through any Threshold Gate; opens Exiter-exclusive ending options

act2_faction.name: Elara's Token
act2_faction.description: Granted for completing Escaped Character quest. A crystalline token that shows paths between stories.
act2_faction.effect: One use: reveal all available exits from current location, including hidden ones

act2_faction.name: Director's Sigil
act2_faction.effect: Access to restricted Green Room areas

act2_faction.name: Revisionist Pen
act2_faction.effect: One-time rewrite of minor narrative element

act2_faction.name: Exiter's Compass
act2_faction.effect: Points toward nearest exit from any story

act2_faction.name: Independent's Blank
act2_faction.description: Appears as whatever token is needed

act2_archives.name: Archival Ticket
act2_archives.description: Grants access to the public Archives; given by the Conservator
act2_archives.effect: Access to Archives study areas; lore and stat boosts

act2_archives.name: First Draft Fragment
act2_archives.description: Reveals part of the Editor's plan

act2_archives.name: Understudy's Mirror
act2_archives.effect: See Editor's true form; once per hub

act2_archives.name: Critic's Quill
act2_archives.description: Powerful critique ability; may turn on user

act2_archives.name: Lost Page
act2_archives.effect: Fills one gap in knowledge check

act2_relationship.name: Director's Trust Seal
act2_relationship.effect: Opens private Director areas; reveals faction history

act3.name: Maren's Signet
act3.effect: Absorb one failed check; grants MAREN_SACRIFICE option

act3.name: Conductor's Baton
act3.effect: Control narrative threads; +1 to Improv in climax

act3.name: Audience Favor
act3.effect: Call Audience support once during confrontation

act3.name: Fly System Map
act3.effect: Navigate vertical story layers; access hidden paths

act3.name: Editor's Original Pen
act3.effect: Alternative confrontation approach; rewrite vs defeat

combinations.name: Maren's Truth
combinations.effect: See truth of Maren's relationship to Editor

combinations.name: Narrative and Audience Command
combinations.effect: Command both narrative and audience; overwhelming presence
